article_title: Crowell & Moring Adds Ex-CMS Official To DC Office
article_text:
Crowell & Moring Adds Ex-CMS Official To DC Office

Law360, New York (July 23, 2014, 1:19 PM ET) -- Crowell & Moring LLP has fortified its health care practice with the addition of a former U.S. Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services official as a partner in the firm's Washington, D.C., office, it said Tuesday.



Teresa D. Miller joined the firm’s health care group in Washington on July 14 after serving as the acting director for both the state exchanges group and the oversight group at the Center for Consumer Information and Insurance Oversight at CMS, where she focused on implementation and enforcement of the...

To view the full article, register now.
